messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] chicago show starting tomorrow !
messages.msgSnippet: Milt, The Sharaku display at the Art Institute was great and very worth checking out.  There were prints there that I haven t seen in Japan.  The Alsdorf
messages.messageBody:
Milt,
The Sharaku display at the Art Institute was great and very worth checking out. There were prints there that I haven't seen in Japan. The Alsdorf collection of Japanese paintings is also worth a look and there is a nice catalogue. And yes, we did breakfast at Denny's twice.

Jim



gang,
for those of you that are coming to the Chicago sword show.......
there are other attractions not to be missed.

1. Breakfast at danny's.......an all-American experience

2. the Art Institute of Chicago currently is having a Japanese print
exhibit, among them many rare prints by none other than THE Sharaku.




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
